Calypsonet Terminal Calypso Crypto Legacy SAM API - 0.2.0
  • All Classes
 

Package org.calypsonet.terminal.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam

Calypso Legacy SAM data structures and selection API.
Since:
0.1.0
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KeyParameter
    This POJO holds the parameters for a key managed by SAM, whether it's a system key or a work key.
    LegacySam
    A partial image of the legacy SAM's content.
    LegacySamSelection
    SAM specific CardSelection providing means to filter SAM and define optional commands to be executed during the selection phase such as the Unlock command.
    LegacySamSelectionFactory
    Factory of a LegacySamSelection, a subtype of CardSelection.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LegacySam.ProductType
    All Calypso SAM products supported by this API.
